intro: Burckella obovata, commonly known as the broad-leaf burckella, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant features opposite, ovate to obovate leaves that are usually smooth and glossy. Its small, white or pale yellow flowers are clustered in terminal inflorescences. Burckella obovata is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forest understories.
